'''Beta 1.13.0.17''' is the tenth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.13.0]], released on September 26, 2019,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360034122052-Minecraft-Beta-1-13-0-17-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.13.0.17 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=September 26, 2019}}</ref> which addresses some performance issues on Xbox One.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed some performance issues on Xbox One.</onlyinclude>
